platform.util

Class Box

  • java.lang.Object
    • platform.util.Box
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public final class Box
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    Represents an immutable bounding-box, defined by a minimum and maximum.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
